title: Children's Activity Room, Common Area Wi-Fi, Dog Park
posting_body: ['4633 Campus Drive, Fort Worth, TX 76119', 'Campus Apartments brings you the best community amenities in the affordable apartment home industry.', 'Some of these include controlled gate access, a wonderful fitness center, and a helpful business center.', 'Cooling off in our shimmering swimming pool will feel great after a hard day’s work.', 'Be sure to sign up for a tour today and be one of the first to tour our brand new community.', 'Apartment Features:', 'Washer and Dryer Connections', 'Microwaves', 'Energy Star Appliances & Lighting', 'Ceiling Fan(s)', '9Ft Ceilings', 'Laundry Closets', 'Community Features:', 'Dog Park', 'Clubroom with Serving Kitchen', 'Fitness Center', 'Grill & Picnic Areas', 'Business Center and Meeting Room', 'Common Area Wi-Fi', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', '*Income restrictions apply, pricing and availability are subject to change daily.', 'Photos may not be of the exact advertised unit.', 'Please contact us today for the most up to date information!']
